data.question: What is the journal title where the article about P2 Addition to Terminal Phosphide M≡P Triple Bonds was published?
data.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society

data.question: Who are the authors of the article discussing the rational synthesis of cyclo-P3 complexes?
data.answer: Nicholas A. Piro and Christopher C. Cummins

data.question: What is the DOI of the article on P2 Addition to Terminal Phosphide M≡P Triple Bonds?
In the synthesis of cyclo-P3 complexes, what is the role of the Mes*NPP)Nb(N[Np]Ar)3 complex?
data.answer: It loses the P2 unit upon gentle heating to form (Mes*N)Nb(N[Np]Ar)3.

data.question: What is the estimated ΔH⧧ value for the process involving the loss of the P2 unit from the diphosphaazide complex?
Is the reaction between P2 and P≡MLn expected to afford MP3 tetrahedra?
Does the reaction between the diphosphaazide complex and terminal phosphide complexes result in cyclo-P3 complexes?
What is the role of the (OC)5W(Mes*NPP)Nb(N[Np]Ar)3 complex in the synthesis discussed?
data.answer: It is used to transfer the (P2)W(CO)5 unit in a manner analogous to substrates 3-M.

data.question: Is the rate constant for the fragmentation of 1 and 1-W(CO)5 unchanged in the presence of the terminal phosphide 3-Mo?
What is the chemical shift for the cyclo-P3 complex (P3)Mo(N[iPr]Ar)3 in the 31P NMR spectrum?
What is the yield of the cyclo-P3 complex (P3)Mo(N[iPr]Ar)3 when isolated from the reaction mixture?
What is the mechanism proposed for the formation of cyclo-P3 complexes from the reaction of P2 with M≡P triple bonds?
data.answer: The formal addition of a P≡P triple bond across a M≡P triple bond.

data.question: Is the reaction between phosphaalkyne AdC≡P and 3-Mo expected to generate a cyclo-CP2 complex?
What is the chemical shift for the cyclo-CP2 complex (AdCP2)Mo(N[iPr]Ar)3 in the 31P NMR spectrum?
What is the yield of the cyclo-CP2 complex (AdCP2)Mo(N[iPr]Ar)3 when isolated from the reaction mixture?
Are the anionic cyclo-P3 niobium complexes described as having greater nucleophilic character compared to other cyclo-P3 complexes?
What is the role of the Mes*NPW(CO)5 group in one of the products according to NMR spectroscopic data?
data.answer: It engages in a fluxional ring-migration process.

data.question: What is the publication date of the article discussing P2 Addition to Terminal Phosphide M≡P Triple Bonds?
Is the eliminated P2 unit from the diphosphaazide complex transferred to terminal phosphide complexes to give cyclo-P3 complexes?
What is the significance of the ΔS⧧ value being negative in the process involving the loss of the P2 unit from the diphosphaazide complex?
data.answer: It indicates a highly ordered transition state.
